channel.title: USPTO Patent Events
channel.description: This feed provides easy access to USPTO Patent events.

item.title: Learn how to make a smooth transition to Patent Center
One-day patents boot camp
item.description: Join the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) for a one-day patents boot camp on November 16 from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. ET at Gateway Area Development District in Morehead, Kentucky. This in-person, single-day workshop is for entrepreneurs, small businesses, and inventors in communities with limited or no internet access, covering tools, techniques, and resources to understand the patent application process.

item.title: One-day trademarks boot camp
item.description: Join the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) for a one-day trademarks boot camp on November 18, 2023 from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. CT with Build Bronzeville SBDC at Quad Communities Development Corporation (QCDC) in Chicago, Illinois. This is an in-person, single-day workshop for entrepreneurs, small businesses, and start-ups in communities with limited or no internet access, covering what they should know about trademarks.
